title: Topic 001 Question 109
body: A company wants to reduce costs for jobs that can be completed at any time. The jobs currently run by using multiple Amazon EC2 On-Demand Instances and the jobs take slightly less than 2 hours to complete. If a job falls for any reason it must be restarted from the beginning.
Which solution will meet these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
options: Purchase Reserved Instances for the jobs.
Submit a request for a one-time Spot Instance for the jobs.
Submit a request for Spot Instances with a defined duration for the jobs.
Use a mixture of On-Demand Instances and Spot Instances for the jobs.
